verses.roman:
tṛtīya divasera rātri-śeṣa yabe haila
ṭhākurera sthāne nārī kahite lāgila

synonyms: tṛtīya divasera—of the third day; rātri-śeṣa—the end of the night; yabe—when; haila—there was; ṭhākurera—of Haridāsa Ṭhākura; sthāne—at the place; nārī—the woman; kahite lāgila—began to speak.
translation: At the end of the night of the third day, the woman spoke to Haridāsa Ṭhākura as follows.
